rows.label: qst650203_msg0003
rows.name:
It very top-secret information!
If Boss see, his head explode.

rows.label: qst650203_msg0004
rows.name:
What are you blathering about?
Just show us already.

rows.label: qst650203_msg0006
rows.name: This is special book of Grampypon.

rows.label: qst650203_msg0007
rows.name:
Grampypon, Dad and Tora
used it as design bible for making
of artificial Blades.

rows.label: qst650203_msg0009
rows.name:
If that book influenced your
designs, I'm not sure I want to
see what's inside.

rows.label: qst650203_msg0010
rows.name:
Yeah, let's not dwell on that.
Anyway, this means that Nopon is
really your grampy- your grandad!

rows.label: qst650203_msg0013
rows.name:
This book very precious to Grampypon.
He spend many hours locked in room
with it...

rows.label: qst650203_msg0014
rows.name:
Presence of book means that
definitely Tora's Grampypon Senzo!

rows.label: qst650203_msg0016
rows.name:
Masterpon, let's go back to Bulge
Harbor right away!
